main.title: WhatGov - Political Monitoring Platform
main.description: Full-stack application for easy political monitoring, with individual and enterprise tiers and full SEO. Features modern UI/UX, daily data processing pipeline using Government APIs, Github Actions, Stripe payments, and OpenAI integration.

main.title: MP Case Automation
main.description: Consulting project to streamline MP office workflows and email processing. Interviewed key stakeholders and implemented a custom Outlook add-in to automate case processing.

main.title: AI for Campaigners
main.description:
AI Agent integrated with campaigners' workflow, to research and analyse international campaign data. 

Accompanied by returning set of comprehensive 2-hour workshops on LLMs and practical AI applications, delivered to 100+ participants across US, Europe, and Africa.

main.title: Flood Defence - Coefficient | ACE Commission
main.description: Tailwind/Python security-oriented platform for data visualisation and emergency response planning, for which I joined the highly experienced Coefficient team on ACE commission on two occasions. Together we implemented specifications for a sizable codebase, which was hosted on AWS and reviewed for open source release.

main.title: Union Training Bot
main.description: Union training bot for the TUC, with a focus on providing a personalised training experience for each user. Features a modern UI/UX and OpenAI integration. Also the first project with my consultancy Civita.

main.title: UK Election Forecasting Dashboard
main.description: Data Search & Visualization Platform showing election forecasts for Election Data Ltd. Forecasts used industry gold-standard Multilinear Regression with Poststratification (MLP).

main.title: Financial Analysis - Parliamentary Workflow Study
main.description: Analysis of spending patterns to identify workflow optimisations.

main.title: Substack Thematic Analysis
main.description: Community network and NLP-based content analysis using topic modeling techniques including Community detection, TFIDF, LDA, and LLM classification.

small.title: Medical Justice - Casework Software Consultation
small.description: Software transition strategy and implementation planning

small.title: EasyMail - Campaign Letter Writing Integration
small.description: Automated letter writing system for non-profit organisations

small.title: AI for Campaigners
small.description: First set of 2-hour workshops on LLMs and practical AI applications, delivered to 60+ participants across US, Europe, and Africa.
small.tech: LLM Technology Overview, Practical Applications, International Delivery, 100+ Participants, Hands-on Exercises

small.title: SMS AI Chatbot - We Are Civitas
small.description: Automated text messaging system for Digital Campaigns Agency, We Are Civitas

small.title: Votespeaker - Campaign Lab
small.description: Campaign letter drafting system for Campaigning Community
